mapper.sql: t.jzid jzid, t.jzmc jzmc, t.jzlx jzlx, t.jzwz jzwz, t.lon lon, t.lat lat, t.xqxclx xqxclx, t.yjddsc yjddsc, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4
t.uuid uuid, t.yalx yalx, t.yamc yamc, t.yajb yajb, t.dxid dxid, t.dxmc dxmc

sql.if: and (t.yamc LIKE concat(concat('%',#{yamc}),'%') ESCAPE '\' or t.dxmc LIKE concat(concat('%',#{yamc}),'%') ESCAPE '\' )

if.test: jdh != null and jdh != '' and orgJgid != '01000000'

mapper.select:
SELECT , c2.code_name jzlxmc FROM YAGL_DWJZXX t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'JZLX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.jzlx = c2.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
AND (t.jzmc LIKE concat(concat('%',#{jzmc}),'%') ESCAPE '\' OR t.jzwz LIKE concat(concat('%',#{jzmc}),'%') ESCAPE '\' )
and t.jdh = #{jdh}

SELECT , '重点单位' yadxType, c2.code_name yalxmc, c6.code_name yajbmc FROM YAGL_YA_ZDDW t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'YALX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.YALX = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c5 on c5.CODETYPE = 'YAJB' And c5.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c6 On c6.CODEID = c5.CODEID And c6.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.YAJB = c6.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
UNION ALL SELECT , '消防保卫警卫' yadxType, c2.code_name yalxmc, c6.code_name yajbmc FROM YAGL_YA_BWJW t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'YALX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.YALX = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c5 on c5.CODETYPE = 'YAJB' And c5.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c6 On c6.CODEID = c5.CODEID And c6.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.YAJB = c6.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
UNION ALL SELECT , '其他对象' yadxType, c2.code_name yalxmc, c6.code_name yajbmc FROM YAGL_YA_QTDX t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'YALX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.YALX = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c5 on c5.CODETYPE = 'YAJB' And c5.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c6 On c6.CODEID = c5.CODEID And c6.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.YAJB = c6.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , '重点单位' yadxType, c2.code_name yalxmc, c6.code_name yajbmc FROM YAGL_YA_ZDDW t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'YALX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.YALX = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c5 on c5.CODETYPE = 'YAJB' And c5.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c6 On c6.CODEID = c5.CODEID And c6.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.YAJB = c6.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , '消防保卫警卫' yadxType, c2.code_name yalxmc, c6.code_name yajbmc FROM YAGL_YA_BWJW t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'YALX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.YALX = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c5 on c5.CODETYPE = 'YAJB' And c5.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c6 On c6.CODEID = c5.CODEID And c6.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.YAJB = c6.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , '其他对象' yadxType, c2.code_name yalxmc, c6.code_name yajbmc FROM YAGL_YA_QTDX t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'YALX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.YALX = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c5 on c5.CODETYPE = 'YAJB' And c5.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c6 On c6.CODEID = c5.CODEID And c6.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.YAJB = c6.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.dwmc dxmc, t.dwdz dxdz, c9.DZMC xfgx, '重点单位' yadxType FROM YAGL_DX_ZDDW t
LEFT JOIN YAGL_XFDZ c9 ON (t.MHDZID=c9.DZID AND c9.DELETE_FLAG = 'N') WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
and t.dwmc LIKE concat(concat('%',#{dxmc}),'%') ESCAPE '\'
and t.mhdzid IN ( SELECT DZID FROM YAGL_XFDZ t START WITH t.DZBM = #{xfgx} CONNECT BY PRIOR t.DZID = SJDZID )
and t.jdh = #{jdh}
ORDER BY t.XZQH,t.DWXZ,t.DWMC ASC) UNION ALL SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.hdzt dxmc, t.hdcswz dxdz, c9.DZMC xfgx, '消防保卫警卫' yadxType FROM YAGL_DX_BWJW t
LEFT JOIN YAGL_XFDZ c9 ON (t.xfgx=c9.dzid AND c9.DELETE_FLAG = 'N') WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
and t.hdzt LIKE concat(concat('%',#{dxmc}),'%')
and t.xfgx IN ( SELECT DZID FROM YAGL_XFDZ t START WITH t.DZBM = #{xfgx} CONNECT BY PRIOR t.DZID = SJDZID )
and t.jdh = #{jdh}
UNION ALL SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.dxmc dxmc, t.dxdz dxdz, c9.DZMC xfgx, '其他对象' yadxType FROM YAGL_DX_QTDX t
LEFT JOIN YAGL_XFDZ c9 ON (t.xfgx=c9.dzid AND c9.DELETE_FLAG = 'N') WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
and t.dxmc LIKE concat(concat('%',#{dxmc}),'%')
and t.xfgx IN ( SELECT DZID FROM YAGL_XFDZ t START WITH t.DZBM = #{xfgx} CONNECT BY PRIOR t.DZID = SJDZID )
and t.jdh = #{jdh}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.hdzt dxmc, t.hdcswz dxdz, c9.DZMC xfgx, '消防保卫警卫' yadxType FROM YAGL_DX_BWJW t
LEFT JOIN YAGL_XFDZ c9 ON (t.xfgx=c9.dzid AND c9.DELETE_FLAG = 'N') WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
and t.hdzt LIKE concat(concat('%',#{dxmc}),'%')
and t.xfgx IN ( SELECT DZID FROM YAGL_XFDZ t START WITH t.DZBM = #{xfgx} CONNECT BY PRIOR t.DZID = SJDZID )
and t.jdh = #{jdh}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.dxmc dxmc, t.dxdz dxdz, c9.DZMC xfgx, '其他对象' yadxType FROM YAGL_DX_QTDX t
LEFT JOIN YAGL_XFDZ c9 ON (t.xfgx=c9.dzid AND c9.DELETE_FLAG = 'N') WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
and t.dxmc LIKE concat(concat('%',#{dxmc}),'%')
and t.xfgx IN ( SELECT DZID FROM YAGL_XFDZ t START WITH t.DZBM = #{xfgx} CONNECT BY PRIOR t.DZID = SJDZID )
and t.jdh = #{jdh}
